skills.name: Core Web Vitals
skills.pattern: LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1

skills.name: Largest Contentful Paint
skills.pattern: Optimize hero image, preload critical resources, fast server

skills.name: First Input Delay
skills.pattern: Break up long tasks, defer non-critical JS, use web workers

skills.name: Cumulative Layout Shift
skills.pattern: Set dimensions on images, reserve space, avoid dynamic content injection

skills.name: Time to First Byte
skills.pattern: CDN, caching, optimize backend, edge computing

skills.name: First Contentful Paint
skills.pattern: Inline critical CSS, preconnect, eliminate render-blocking

skills.name: Time to Interactive
skills.pattern: Code splitting, lazy loading, minimize main thread work

skills.name: Lighthouse
skills.pattern: Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, SEO scores

skills.name: Chrome DevTools Performance
skills.pattern: Timeline, flame chart, main thread analysis

skills.name: WebPageTest
skills.pattern: Multiple locations, connection speeds, filmstrip view

skills.name: Lazy Loading Images
skills.pattern: , Intersection Observer API

skills.name: Preloading
skills.pattern: <link rel='preload' as='font' href='font.woff2' crossorigin>

skills.name: Prefetching
skills.pattern: <link rel='prefetch' href='next-page.js'>

skills.name: Preconnect
skills.pattern: <link rel='preconnect' href='https://api.example.com'>

skills.name: Code Splitting
skills.pattern: Dynamic import(), route-based splitting, React.lazy

skills.name: Tree Shaking
skills.pattern: ES modules, sideEffects: false, named imports

skills.name: Bundle Analysis
skills.pattern: webpack-bundle-analyzer, source-map-explorer

skills.name: Compression
skills.pattern: gzip, Brotli compression, Content-Encoding header

skills.name: Image Optimization
skills.pattern: WebP/AVIF, responsive images, srcset, sizes

skills.name: Image CDN
skills.pattern: Cloudinary, imgix - resize, format on the fly

skills.name: SVG Optimization
skills.pattern: SVGO, inline critical SVGs, sprite sheets

skills.name: Browser Caching
skills.pattern: Cache-Control: max-age=31536000, immutable for hashed assets

skills.name: Service Workers
skills.pattern: Cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate strategies

skills.name: CDN Caching
skills.pattern: Cloudflare, Fastly - cache rules, purging, edge functions

skills.name: SSR
skills.pattern: HTML on server, hydration on client, faster FCP

skills.name: SSG
skills.pattern: Pre-render at build time, CDN distribution

skills.name: ISR
skills.pattern: revalidate: 60, on-demand revalidation

skills.name: Streaming SSR
skills.pattern: React 18 Suspense, streaming HTML chunks

skills.name: Critical CSS
skills.pattern: Extract critical path CSS, defer rest

skills.name: CSS Containment
skills.pattern: contain: layout paint, content-visibility: auto
